article_title: Obama not first president to be sued
article_text:

article_metadata.description: WASHINGTON — House Republicans’ efforts to sue President Barack Obama are chugging along. House Speaker John Boehner, R-West Chester, has announced his rationale for suing the president — namely, executive actions that Obama took to change the employer mandate in the Affordable Care Act.
